channel.title: mapbox on Zekun's Zone

item.title: Display JPEG historical map tiles in Mapbox
item.description: Mapbox is a great tool for visualizing maps especially when you have multiple layers and would like to compare them at the same location. In my case, I have millions of small tiles in jpeg format, and I would like to overlay those tiles on OSM map. Those map tiles are generated from a neural network by taking OSM tiles as input and the resulting tiles are close to historical style.
